markdownRemark.html: I was featured in Lullabot’s recent Drupal podcast! We discuss the current Drupal initiative to include a client-side framework in Drupal core (Angular, Ember, React, etc). As with anything regarding JavaScript, this caused quite a stir in the community. I wrote a post about it, advocating against this proposal. You can check out the episode on their site, here.
